00020 #ifndef MATRIX_HPP
00021 #define MATRIX_HPP
00022 
00023 #include "vector.hpp"
00024 
00025 
00026 namespace isis
00027 {
00028 namespace util
00029 {
00030 
00031 template < typename TYPE, size_t COLS, size_t ROWS, typename CONTAINER = _internal::array<TYPE, ROWS *COLS> >
00032 class FixedMatrix : public FixedVector<TYPE, ROWS *COLS, CONTAINER>
00033 {
00034 public:
00035     static const size_t rows = ROWS;
00036     static const size_t columns = COLS;
00037 
00038     template<typename TYPE2, typename CONTAINER2>
00039     void copyFrom( const FixedVector<TYPE2, COLS, CONTAINER2> src[ROWS] ) {
00040         for( size_t r = 0; r < ROWS; r++ ) {
00041             const TYPE2 *ptr = &src[r][0];
00042             std::copy( ptr, ptr + COLS, &elem( 0, r ) );
00043         }
00044     }
00045 
00046     FixedMatrix() {}
00047 
00048     template<typename TYPE2>
00049     FixedMatrix( const TYPE2 src[ROWS *COLS] ): FixedVector<TYPE, ROWS *COLS, CONTAINER>( src ) {}
00050 
00051     template<typename TYPE2, typename CONTAINER2>
00052     FixedMatrix( const FixedVector<TYPE2, COLS, CONTAINER2> src[ROWS] ) {copyFrom( src );}
00053 
00054 
00055     TYPE &elem( size_t column, size_t row ) {return ( *this )[column+row*COLS];}
00056     const TYPE &elem( size_t column, size_t row )const {return ( *this )[column+row*COLS];}
00057 
00058     FixedMatrix<TYPE, ROWS, COLS> transpose()const {
00059         FixedMatrix<TYPE, ROWS, COLS> ret;
00060 
00061         for( size_t m = 0; m < COLS; m++ )
00062             for( size_t n = 0; n < ROWS; n++ ) {
00063                 ret.elem( n, m ) = this->elem( m, n );
00064             }
00065 
00066         return ret;
00067     }
00068     template<typename TYPE2, size_t COLS2, typename CONTAINER2> FixedMatrix<TYPE2, COLS2, ROWS, CONTAINER2>
00069     dot( const FixedMatrix<TYPE2, COLS2, COLS, CONTAINER2> &right )const {
00070         // transpose the right, so we can use columns as rows
00071         const FixedMatrix<TYPE2, COLS, COLS2, CONTAINER2> rightT = right.transpose();
00072         const FixedMatrix<TYPE, COLS, ROWS, CONTAINER> &left = *this;
00073         FixedMatrix<TYPE2, COLS2, ROWS, CONTAINER2> ret;
00074 
00075         for( size_t c = 0; c < right.columns; c++ ) { //result has as much columns as right
00076             const TYPE2 *rstart = &rightT.elem( 0, c );
00077 
00078             for( size_t r = 0; r < left.rows; r++ ) { //result has as much rows as left
00079                 const TYPE *lstart = &left.elem( 0, r ), *lend = lstart + left.columns;
00080                 ret.elem( c, r ) = std::inner_product( lstart, lend, rstart, TYPE2() );
00081             }
00082         }
00083 
00084         return ret;
00085     }
00086 
00087     template<typename TYPE2, typename CONTAINER2> FixedVector<TYPE2, COLS, CONTAINER2>
00088     dot( const FixedVector<TYPE2, COLS, CONTAINER2> &right )const {
00089         const FixedMatrix<TYPE, COLS, ROWS, CONTAINER> &left = *this;
00090         FixedVector<TYPE2, ROWS, CONTAINER2> ret;
00091         const TYPE2 *rstart = &right[0];
00092 
00093         for( size_t r = 0; r < rows; r++ ) { //result has as much rows as left
00094             const TYPE *lstart = &elem( 0, r ), *lend = lstart + left.columns;
00095             ret[r] = std::inner_product( lstart, lend, rstart, TYPE2() );
00096         }
00097 
00098         return ret;
00099     }
00100 
00101     FixedVector<TYPE, COLS, CONTAINER> getRow( size_t rownum )const {
00102         FixedVector<TYPE, COLS, CONTAINER> ret;
00103         const TYPE *start = &elem( 0, rownum ), *end = start + COLS;
00104         ret.copyFrom( start, end );
00105         return ret;
00106     }
00107 };
00108 
00109 template<typename TYPE>
00110 class Matrix4x4: public FixedMatrix<TYPE, 4, 4>
00111 {
00112 public:
00113     Matrix4x4( const FixedMatrix<TYPE, 4, 4> &src ): FixedMatrix<TYPE, 4, 4>( src ) {}
00114 
00115     Matrix4x4( const TYPE src[16] ): FixedMatrix<TYPE, 4, 4>( src ) {}
00116     template<typename TYPE2> Matrix4x4(
00117         const vector4<TYPE2> &row1,
00118         const vector4<TYPE2> &row2,
00119         const vector4<TYPE2> &row3 = vector4<TYPE2>( 0, 0, 1, 0 ),
00120         const vector4<TYPE2> &row4 = vector4<TYPE2>( 0, 0, 0, 1 )
00121     ) {
00122         const vector4<TYPE2> src[4] = {row1, row2, row3, row4};
00123         copyFrom( src );
00124     }
00125 };
00126 
00127 }
00128 }
